text: A Little Crane () is a 1968 Soviet drama movie directed by Nikolay Moskalenko.Бесплатные показы фильмов о войне организуют в БарнаулеЖуравушка It stars Lyudmila Chursina, Nonna Mordyukova, and Tatyana Pelttser. == Actors == * Lyudmila Chursina as Marfa * Nonna Mordyukova as Glafira * Tatyana Pelttser as Nastasya * Rimma Markova as Avdotya * Armen Dzhigarkhanyan as Styshnoy * Nikolai Gritsenko as Markelov * Georgi Zhzhyonov as Father Leonid == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1968 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies
title: A Little Crane
